TITLE: Basic YoloDB Usage with TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to create a table, insert a record, find a record by ID, and search with a custom filter in YoloDB. Shows the core functionality of the database.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pizzajsdev/yolodb/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { yolodb } from 'yolodb'

// Create a table with a primary key
const usersTable = yolodb<User>('full/path/to/users.json', 'id', [])

// Insert a record
usersTable.insert({
  id: '1',
  name: 'John Doe',
  createdAt: new Date(),
})

// Find by ID
const user = usersTable.findById('1')

// Search with custom filter
const activeUsers = usersTable.search((user) => user.status === 'active')
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: YoloDB Table Operations Reference
DESCRIPTION: Comprehensive reference of available table operations in YoloDB, including basic CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete) and additional utility methods like search, bulk operations, and truncation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pizzajsdev/yolodb/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
const table = yolodb<Record>(filePath, primaryKeyField, initialData)

// Basic CRUD
table.all() // Get all records
table.findById(id) // Find by primary key
table.findBy(field, value) // Find by field value
table.search(filterFn) // Custom search
table.insert(record) // Insert single record
table.insertMany(records) // Bulk insert
table.update(record) // Update record
table.updateMany(records) // Bulk update
table.delete(id) // Delete by id
table.deleteMany(ids) // Bulk delete
table.truncate() // Clear all records
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Type Definitions with YoloDB in TypeScript
DESCRIPTION: Best practice example demonstrating how to use TypeScript interfaces with YoloDB to ensure type safety. Defines a User interface with properly typed fields and creates a typed table.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pizzajsdev/yolodb/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
interface User {
  id: string
  name: string
  createdAt: Date
}

const usersTable = yolodb<User>('users.json', 'id', [])
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing Repository Pattern with YoloDB
DESCRIPTION: Example of using the Repository Pattern with YoloDB to abstract database access. Shows how to extend YoloDbRepository and implement custom repository interfaces for cleaner architecture.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pizzajsdev/yolodb/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
interface UserRepository {
  findByUsername(username: string): User | null
}

class MockedUserRepository extends YoloDbRepository<User> implements UserRepository {
  constructor() {
    super("users.json", "id");
  }

  // Implement interface methods here
}
// Your real repository would look like this:
class DrizzleUserRepository implements UserRepository { ... }
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Error Handling in YoloDB
DESCRIPTION: Example of implementing error handling with YoloDB operations. Shows how to use try-catch blocks to handle potential file system errors during database operations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pizzajsdev/yolodb/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
try {
  table.insert(record)
} catch (error) {
  // Handle file system errors
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cleaning Up Data in YoloDB
DESCRIPTION: Example of how to clean up data in YoloDB, particularly useful in test teardown scenarios. Uses the truncate method to clear all records from a table.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pizzajsdev/yolodb/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
// e.g. in your tests teardown
table.truncate()
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing YoloDB via npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the YoloDB package as a development dependency using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/pizzajsdev/yolodb/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -D yolodb
```
